									File Handling
									
DESCRIPTION
Project Objective: As a developer, write a program to read, write, and append to a file.

// READ A File

package filehandling;
import java.io.*;
import java.util.*;

public class ReadFile 
{
	public static void main(String[] args) 
	{
		// TODO Auto-generated method stub
		
		try 
		{
            File Obj = new File("myfile.txt");
            
            Scanner Reader = new Scanner(Obj);
            while (Reader.hasNextLine()) 
			{
                String data = Reader.nextLine();
				System.out.println("Reading Data");
                System.out.println(data);
            }
            Reader.close();
        }
        catch (FileNotFoundException e) 
		{
            System.out.println("An error has occurred.");
            e.printStackTrace();
        }
	        
	}

}


// WRITE A File

package filehandling;
import java.io.*;

public class WriteFile 
{
	public static void main(String[] args) 
	{
		// TODO Auto-generated method stub
		
		try 
		{
            FileWriter Writer = new FileWriter("myfile.txt");
            Writer.write("Files in Java are seriously good!!");
            Writer.close();
			System.out.println("Writing a file");
            System.out.println("Successfully written.");
        }
        catch (IOException e) 
		{
            System.out.println("An error has occurred.");
            e.printStackTrace();
        }

	}

}


// APPEND 

package filehandling;
import java.io.*;
public class AppendFile 
{
	public static void main(String[] args)
	{
		// TODO Auto-generated method stub
		File f = new File("myfile.txt");
        String text = "Added text";
        try 
		{
        	FileWriter fw = new FileWriter(f.getName(),true);
            BufferedWriter bw = new BufferedWriter(fw);
            bw.write(text);
            bw.close();
			System.out.println("Appending text in file");
            System.out.println("Successfully Done");
           
        }
        catch(IOException e) 
		{
        	System.out.println("An error has occured");
        }

	}

}
